title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 7 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Summer Walks and Talks      Location: various Fees: entrance fee only     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/05/2016 to 09/05/2016 Choose from a variety of Ranger guided events during your summer visit to the park View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Sun Valley Center/Craters of the Moon Art Show      Location: Craters of the Moon and Ketchum Fees: entrance fee only     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/20/2016 to 09/30/2016 Multi-artist exhibition at the Sun Valley Center for the Arts in Ketchum. In addition, there will be 2 specially commissioned sculptures on display at Craters of the Moon.  View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Resource Presentations      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Visitor Center  Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 Talk to our staff scientists and biological technicians about the important work they do in the field to keep our wildlife and vegetation healthy. View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Fee Free Day      Location: All National Parks! Fees: Fee Free!     Thursday, August 25, 2016 There are 16 fee free days to visit your national parks in 2016  View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Nature Photography Workshop       Time: 1:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: visitor center Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Do you want to learn to take better pictures? View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve National Park Service Centennial Celebration      Time: 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM Location: visitor center Fees: Fee free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Celebrate 100 years of national parks with a variety of special events including Rangers, an astronaut and "Two Gun" Bob Limbert! View Details      Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve Star Party      Time: 9:30 PM Location: Caves area parking lot Fees: entrance fee only     Friday, September 2, 2016 View the stars from the Moon... View Details                Daily Events Films A Trip to the Moon (25 min.)  and Among the Craters of the Moon (17 min.) are shown by request.
